name: Caffe Latte
desc: A single shot of espresso in steamed (not frothed) milk. The ratio of milk to coffee should be about 3:1

name: Cafe au Lait
desc: Similar to a latte but uses brewed coffee instead of espresso with a 1:1 coffee to milk ratio

name: Americano
desc: A single shot of espresso with about 7 ounces of hot water added to the mix

name: Cappuccino
desc: Equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and frothed milk

name: Dry Cappuccino
desc: Regular cappuccino, only with a smaller amount of foam, and no steamed milk at all

name: Cafe Macchiato
desc: A single shot of espresso with steamed milk added. The ratio of milk to coffee should be 4:1

name: Cafe Breva
desc: Regular cappuccino made with half-and-half instead of milk
